name: Ratstronaut
description:
Escape the sewer. Become the true Ratstronaut.

                                                  Your copy isn't broken, just haunted.

Controls: WASD, look with mouse, Left Click to use string cheese grappling hook, M to open Menu, P to set custom checkpoint, I to remove custom checkpoint (reset spawn to the beginning of the level), K to return to checkpoint/beginning of level. 


Consider going right at the beginning to practice your grappling and movement. Play around a bit and you'll get the hang of it :)

Credits:

Initial concept, game design, world design, creative leads: Kirby Taylor, Anders Taylor.
Programming: Anders Taylor
Title Screen: Charly Taylor
Music: Noah aka Dress Codes https://open.spotify.com/artist/6qtzMd7oGlPoHC8m5RyABw?si=_sMNk2jyRtKVoXUnyCi3yA..., AbstractProjections https://abstrctprjxns.bandcamp.com

(If you play on Mac it might actually be broken)
